extendedInfo.detail: One liter of Pedialyte Provides: sodium, 45 mEq; potassium, 20 mEq; chloride, 35 mEq.  Kid approved teste!. No.1 Pharmacist & pediatrician recommended brand for hydration. Quickly replaces electrolytes. With zinc for immune support. Trusted by doctors and hospitals since 1966. Pedialyte is designed to prevent dehydration (for mild to moderate dehydration) more effectively than common beverages. Level per liter: Pedialyte advanced care; Pedialyte & Pedialyte advanced care; Sports drink; Soda; 100% apple juice; Water; Electrolyte sodium in pedialyte compared to common beverages. Pedialyte quickly replenishes fluids, zinc, and electrolytes to help prevent dehydration due to: vomiting & diarrhea; heat exhaustion; intense exercise; travel. Designed for fast, effective rehydration.  Natural and artificial flavor. Questions or comments? Call 1-800-986-8441, Visit us at www.pedialyte.com.
extendedInfo.ingredients: Water, Dextrose, Less Than 0.5% Of: Citric Acid, Natural And Artificial Flavor, Potassium Citrate, Salt, Sodium Citrate, Sucralose, Acesulfame Potassium, Zinc Gluconate And Yellow 6.
extendedInfo.directions: Use under medical supervision. Ready to use. Do not add water or dilute. Tastes best served cold. Usage: For children under 1 year of age: consult your doctor. To rehydrate after fluid loss: begin with small frequent sips. 1-2 liters per day may be needed while symptoms persist. Consult your doctor if vomiting, fever, or diarrhea continues beyond 24 hours or if consumption needs are greater than 2 liters per day. For general rehydration: sip as needed. Advanced rehydration: Replaces electrolytes (Pedialyte); Replaces electrolytes (Pedialyte advanced care); Replaces electrolytes (Pedialyte advanced care). Advanced rehydration: Replenishes zinc (Pedialyte); Replenishes zinc (Pedialyte advanced care); Replenishes zinc (Pedialyte advanced care). Advanced rehydration: Pre active prebiotics (Pedialyte advanced care); Pre active prebiotics (Pedialyte advanced care). 33% more electrolytes (60 mEq sodium electrolyes per liter vs 45 mEQ in original pedialyte) (Pedialyte advanced care).
extendedInfo.warnings: Instructions: Do not use if printed band around cap or inner foil seal is missing or broken. Remove protective band and twist off cap. Remove and throw away protective foil seal. After opening, replace cap, refrigerate and use within 48 hours. Store unopened bottles in a cool place. Avoid excessive heat. Do not reuse bottle.
